itemInfo.itemDesc: A necklace decorated with a Resplendent Diamond.

item.name: Diamond Necklace
item.desc: A necklace decorated with a Diamond.

item.name: Melted Gold Shard
item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Gold Ore.

item.name: Diamond
item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Grinding Rough Diamonds.

item.name: Star Diamond Necklace
item.desc: A necklace decorated with a Star Diamond.
